text: int main ( ) { int t , N , A [ 50 ] , i , j , k , sum , product , count , flag ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; while ( t -- ) { scanf ( "%d" , & N ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < N ; i ++ ) scanf ( "%d" , & A [ i ] ) ; count = 0 ; for ( i = 0 ; i < N ; i ++ ) { for ( j = i ; j < N ; j ++ ) { flag = 1 ; for ( k = i ; k < j ; k ++ ) { if ( A [ k ] > A [ k + 1 ] ) { flag = 0 ; break ; } } if ( flag == 1 ) count ++ ; } } printf ( "%d\n" , count ) ; } return 0 ; }
